title: Do you think All chat in game can have an affect on the players play style especially in ranked
body: Do you think All chat in game can have an affect on the players play style especially in ranked and when playing ranked should you disable all chat?

replies.body: Most of the time it's going to be your team that psychs you out not the enemy team. There is a lot of schools of thought on it. Some players mute everyone and just use smart pings.
